4Story was once a much-hyped fantasy PC MMORPG which had quite a sizable community, but like most Free-to-Play titles its popularity waned over the years. The English server is still running though, now under Gameforge. But that is not the game we are talking about here, as its developer Zemi Interactive recently announced… well, you guessed it, a mobile version of the MMORPG! Titled 4Story: Age of Heroes, it is an action RPG where players hunt solo until unlocking multiplayer modes such as real-time PVP and real-time boss raids. … [Read more...] about – Classic PC MMORPG prepares for mobile platform launch

From September 17-29, the third WSOP.com Online Circuit is taking place, bringing with it significant prize pools, great player turnouts and the chance to win your very own, highly-respected circuit ring. As long as you’re located in New Jersey, you can get in on the action. There is over $1 million guaranteed throughout the competition, and 13 rings will be rewarded over 13 days.
